entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who died and was buried in a beautiful place. He is mentioned as being rescued by an elf who knew where to come.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is visiting Dobby's grave and is sad about leaving him behind.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having an eye that Harry saw in a mirror fragment.

relationships.description: Harry visited Dobby's grave and was sad about leaving him behind.
Harry saw Dumbledore's eye in a mirror fragment.
